mapper.select: select * from faq ORDER BY faq_no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into faq (faq_no, faq_title, faq_content, user_id, faq_regdate) VALUES ((select *from (select max(faq_no)+1 from faq) next), #{faqTitle}, #{faqContent}, #{userId}, now())
mapper.update: update faq set faq_title = #{faqTitle}, faq_content = #{faqContent}, faq_regdate = now() where faq_no = #{faqNo}
